newsitem.title: BELGIUM: No EU 97/98 grain tenders before end June-Fischler.
newsitem.headline: No EU 97/98 grain tenders before end June-Fischler.

text.p: European Farm Commissioner Franz Fischler said on Monday the EU's wheat export tax was likely to continue for the moment because world prices remain high.
He also told reporters after addressing an EU farm conference that the EU's 1997/1998 grain export tenders would not announced before the end of June.
